rooms.name: Entrance and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that doubles as a living area with ample natural lighting. Wheelchair accessible.

rooms.name: Studio Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area. Equipped with accessible features.

rooms.name: Study Library
rooms.description: A serene library space with ample storage for books and a comfortable reading nook. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the study to the northeast.

rooms.name: Studio Bedroom
rooms.description: The primary bedroom designed as a bachelor pad with multifunctional furniture. Wheelchair accessible with clear pathways.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible bathroom with grab bars and a roll-in shower.

openings.description: Main entrance with a ramp for accessibility.
Large windows to maximize natural light, following Vastu guidelines.

design_considerations: Vastu alignment: The study is placed in the northeast quadrant, ensuring positive energy flow.
Wheelchair accessibility: All rooms are accessible with ramps and broad doorways as per local norms.
Industrial aesthetic: Minimalist design with exposed structural elements and a modern finish.
